required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of the Calypso Knee System for Symptom Relief in Subjects With Medial Knee Osteoarthritis

brief_summary.textblock: A clinical study to evaluate the safety and effectiveness of the Calypso Knee System when used in subjects with symptomatic osteoarthritis of the medial compartment of the knee.

detailed_description.textblock: Prospective, multicenter clinical study of the Calypso Knee System. 80 subjects will be enrolled in this study at up to 10 investigational sites located in the U.S. Male or female subjects age 25 to 65 years, with a diagnosis of medial knee osteoarthritis and study knee pain with an overall WOMAC pain score â‰¥ 40 (scale 0-100).

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Western Ontario and McMasters University Osteoarthritis Index (WOMAC) Pain Score from baseline
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change at 24 months relative to baseline
primary_outcome.description: The WOMAC Pain score is derived from a sub-section of the Knee injury and Osteoarthritis Outcome Score (KOOS) Knee Survey. The WOMAC Pain scores range from 0-100 with lower scores considered lower pain.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Western Ontario and McMasters University Osteoarthritis Index (WOMAC) Function Score from baseline
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change at 24 months relative to baseline
primary_outcome.description: The WOMAC Function score is derived from a sub-section of the Knee injury and Osteoarthritis Outcome Score (KOOS) Knee Survey. The WOMAC Function scores range from 0-100 with lower scores considered to have better function.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Treatment-Emergent Adverse Events resulting in Secondary Surgical Interventions
primary_outcome.description: Incidence of Secondary Surgical Intervention due to implant related Adverse Events

primary_outcome.measure: Maintenance of Implant Integrity by Radiographic Review
primary_outcome.description: Implant integrity will be assessed by radiographic review to verify that the implant is not disassembled

intervention.description: The Calypso Knee System is an extra-capsular knee implant designed to fill the therapeutic gap between conservative care and more invasive surgical interventions for knee osteoarthritis.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Participants age - 25 to 65 years
2. Body Mass Index (BMI) of < 35, Weight < 300 lbs
3. Knee osteoarthritis pain on the inner side of knee that has continued after at least 6 months of non-operative treatment
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Symptoms of osteoarthritis in the other knee or in lateral (outer) or patellofemoral compartments of the target knee
2. Knee ligament or meniscal instability
3. Other bone or joint conditions such as Rheumatoid arthritis, Paget's disease, Charcot's disease or general conditions such as allergy or hypersensitivity to certain metals, active infection, certain neurological conditions, use of medication such as steroids or chemotherapy that could impact study participation or results
